actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A resolution to express the sense of the House of Representatives that the Congress should promptly pass legislation to promote the application of new telephone communications technology and the expansion of nationwide telephone service at uniform, low rates.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the Congress should promptly pass proposed legislation that would comprehensively revise the telecommunications policy of the United States in order to promote the application of new telephone technology and the expansion of nationwide telephone service at uniform and low rates.

titles.title: A resolution to express the sense of the House of Representatives that the Congress should promptly pass legislation to promote the application of new telephone communications technology and the expansion of nationwide telephone service at uniform, low rates.
